uk.ac.open.kmi.msm4j.io.impl
Class ServiceTransformationEngine

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.open.kmi.msm4j.io.impl.ServiceTransformationEngine

public class ServiceTransformationEngine
extends Object

ServiceTransformationEngine is a Singleton Facade to any registered Service Transformation implementations. Transformation implementations are automatically detected and registered at runtime

Since:
18/07/2013
Author:
Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)

ServiceTransformationEngine

Method Detail

canTransform

public boolean canTransform(String mediaType)
Checks whether the ServiceTransformationEngine has support for a given media type.

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type to check for
Returns:
true if it can be transformed, false otherwise.

getSupportedMediaTypes

public Set<String> getSupportedMediaTypes()
Obtains a set with all supported media types based on the loaded plugins

Returns:
the Set of media types supported.

getTransformer

public ServiceTransformer getTransformer(String mediaType)
Obtains the loaded transformer for a given media type or null if no transformer can deal with this type.

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type we are interested in
Returns:
the corresponding Service ServiceTransformationEngine or null if none is adequate.

getFileExtension

public String getFileExtension(String mediaType)
Gets the corresponding file extension to a given media type by checking with the appropriate transformer

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type for which to obtain the file extension
Returns:
the file extension or null if it is not supported. Callers are advised to check first that the media type is supported canTransform .

getFilenameFilter

public FilenameFilter getFilenameFilter(String mediaType)
Gets the corresponding filename filter to a given media type by checking with the appropriate transformer

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type for which to obtain the file extension
Returns:
the filename filter or null if it is not supported. Callers are advised to check first that the media type is supported canTransform .

transform

public List<Service> transform(File originalFile,
                               String mediaType)
                        throws TransformationException
Parses and transforms a file with service description(s), e.g. SAWSDL, OWL-S, hRESTS, etc., and returns a list of Service objects defined in the file.

Parameters:
originalFile - The file or folder containing the semantic Web service description(s)
mediaType - The media type of the file to transform. This is used to select the right transformer.
Returns:
A List with the services transformed conforming to MSM model
Throws:
TransformationException

transform

public List<Service> transform(File originalFile,
                               String baseUri,
                               String mediaType)
                        throws TransformationException
Parses and transforms a file with service description(s), e.g. SAWSDL, OWL-S, hRESTS, etc., and returns a list of Service objects defined in the file.

Parameters:
originalFile - The file or folder containing the semantic Web service description(s)
baseUri - The base URI to use while transforming the service description
mediaType - The media type of the file to transform. This is used to select the right transformer.
Returns:
A List with the services transformed conforming to MSM model
Throws:
TransformationException

transform

public List<Service> transform(InputStream originalDescription,
                               String mediaType)
                        throws TransformationException
Parses and transforms a stream with service description(s), e.g. SAWSDL, OWL-S, hRESTS, etc., and returns a list of Service objects defined in the stream.

Parameters:
originalDescription - The semantic Web service description(s)
mediaType - The media type of the file to transform. This is used to select the right transformer.
Returns:
A List with the services transformed conforming to MSM model
Throws:
TransformationException

transform

public List<Service> transform(InputStream originalDescription,
                               String baseUri,
                               String mediaType)
                        throws TransformationException
Parses and transforms a stream with service description(s), e.g. SAWSDL, OWL-S, hRESTS, etc., and returns a list of Service objects defined in the stream.

Parameters:
originalDescription - The semantic Web service description(s)
baseUri - The base URI to use while transforming the service description
mediaType - The media type of the file to transform. This is used to select the right transformer.
Returns:
A List with the services transformed conforming to MSM model
Throws:
TransformationException
